ns2:video.ns2:name: What's New in Oxygen XML Editor 19
ns2:video.ns2:description: This video presents some of the new features in Oxygen XML Editor 19.

ns2:video.ns2:name: Working with DITA Reusable Components View
ns2:video.ns2:description: This demonstration shows you how to use the DITA Resuable Components view that was introduced in version 19.0.

ns2:video.ns2:name: Fast and Simple Ways to Create and Convert DITA Topics
ns2:video.ns2:description: This demonstration shows you the fastest ways to create new DITA topics and how to convert existing DITA documents to another type.

ns2:video.ns2:name: Compare and Merge Directories Against a Common Base in Oxygen XML Editor 19
ns2:video.ns2:description: This video presents Compare Directories Against a Base feature available in oXygen XML suite of products. The feature helps you identify and merge changes between multiple modifications of the same directory structure.

ns2:video.ns2:name: Markdown Support
ns2:video.ns2:description: This video presents the Markdown Editor that is available in oXygen XML, allowing you to convert Markdown syntax to HTML or DITA. Aside from the plain text syntax that is common among most Markdown applications, the Markdown editor also integrates many other powerful features that content authors are accustomed to using for other types of documents.

ns2:video.ns2:name: Media Objects
ns2:video.ns2:description: This video presents the possibility of using media form controls in oXygen XML to play video content, both when editing in the Author mode and in any HTML5-based output.
